response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit you. This product holds immense value to me, and I am excited about the possibility of sharing its benefits with you. Considering its significance and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose a purchase price of $1,300,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to me and its perceived value to you, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. I trust this proposal will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing further details if you are interested. Please let me know your thoughts at your earliest convenience.", "product_price": 1300000}
